FuncDef:
The ospf mib-binding command binds an OSPF process to SNMP and enables OSPF to respond to SNMP requests.
The undo ospf mib-binding command removes the binding. The ospf mib-binding command binds an OSPF process to SNMP and enables OSPF to respond to SNMP requests. The undo ospf mib-binding command removes the binding. By default, OSPF processes are not bound to SNMP.

ParaDef.Info:
process-id Specifies the ID of an OSPF process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.
